title: 13 New CSS Features You Can Start Using Today

if you're looking on my screen you're

scroll bar gutter itself allows you to

to allow you to say, "Hey, wait a

is going to get longer or that there
will be scroll bars here and therefore
we'll be able to make sure uh that there
will be no layout shift. So just a lot
of control. Generally when you have like
a either your body of like like a blog

you can't really explicitly put in line

Now content visibility allows you to
